verses.verse: Come near, <S%H7126><s%> you nations, <S%H1471><s%> to hear! <S%H8085><s%> Listen, <S%H7181><s%> you peoples. <S%H3816><s%> Let the earth <S%H776><s%> and all it contains <S%H4393><s%> hear; <S%H8085><s%> the world, <S%H8398><s%> and everything that comes from it. <S%H6631><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is enraged <S%H7110><s%> against all the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and angry <S%H2534><s%> with all their armies. <S%H6635><s%> He has utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them. <S%H5414><s%> He has given them over for slaughter. <S%H2874><s%>

Their slain <S%H2491><s%> will also be cast out, <S%H7993><s%> and the stench <S%H889><s%> of their dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> will come up; <S%H5927><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> will melt <S%H4549><s%> in their blood. <S%H1818><s%>

All of the army <S%H6635><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> will be dissolved. <S%H4743><s%> The sky <S%H8064><s%> will be rolled up <S%H1556><s%> like a scroll, <S%H5612><s%> and all its armies <S%H6635><s%> will fade away, <S%H5034><s%> as a leaf <S%H5929><s%> fades from off <S%H5034><s%> a vine <S%H1612><s%> or <S%H5034><s%> a fig tree. <S%H8384><s%>

For my sword <S%H2719><s%> has drunk <S%H7301><s%> its fill in the sky. <S%H8064><s%> Behold, <S%H3381><s%> it will come down on Edom, <S%H123><s%> and on the people <S%H5971><s%> of my curse, <S%H2764><s%> for judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s sword <S%H2719><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with blood. <S%H1818><s%> It is covered <S%H2459><s%> with fat, <S%H1878><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of lambs <S%H3733><s%> and goats, <S%H6260><s%> with the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the kidneys <S%H3629><s%> of rams; <S%H352><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in Bozrah, <S%H1224><s%> And a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H2874><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom. <S%H123><s%>

The wild oxen <S%H7214><s%> will come down <S%H3381><s%> with them, <S%H6499><s%> and the young bulls with the mighty bulls; <S%H47><s%> and their land <S%H776><s%> will be drunken <S%H7301><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> and their dust <S%H6083><s%> made greasy <S%H1878><s%> with fat. <S%H2459><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has a day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> of recompense <S%H7966><s%> for the cause <S%H7379><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

Its streams <S%H5158><s%> will be turned <S%H2015><s%> into pitch, <S%H2203><s%> its dust <S%H6083><s%> into sulfur, <S%H1614><s%> And its land <S%H776><s%> will become burning <S%H1197><s%> pitch. <S%H2203><s%>

It won't <S%H3518><s%> be quenched night <S%H3915><s%> nor day. <S%H3119><s%> Its smoke <S%H6227><s%> will go up <S%H5927><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> From generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation, <S%H1755><s%> it will lie waste. <S%H2717><s%> No one will pass through <S%H5674><s%> it forever <S%H5331><s%> and ever. <S%H5331><s%>

But the pelican <S%H6893><s%> and the porcupine <S%H7090><s%> will possess <S%H3423><s%> it. <S%H3244><s%> The owl and the raven <S%H6158><s%> will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in it. <S%H5186><s%> He will stretch the line <S%H6957><s%> of confusion <S%H8414><s%> over it, <S%H6957><s%> and the plumb line of emptiness. <S%H922><s%>
They shall call <S%H7121><s%> its nobles <S%H2715><s%> to the kingdom, <S%H4410><s%> but none shall be there; <S%H8269><s%> and all its princes shall be nothing. <S%H657><s%>

Thorns <S%H5518><s%> will come up <S%H5927><s%> in its palaces, <S%H759><s%> nettles <S%H7057><s%> and thistles <S%H2336><s%> in its fortresses; <S%H4013><s%> and it will be a habitation <S%H5116><s%> of jackals, <S%H8577><s%> a court <S%H2681><s%> for ostriches. <S%H1323><s%>

The wild animals of the desert <S%H6728><s%> will meet <S%H6298><s%> with the wolves, <S%H338><s%> and the wild goat <S%H8163><s%> will cry <S%H7121><s%> to his fellow. <S%H7453><s%> Yes, <S%H3917><s%> the night creature shall settle <S%H7280><s%> there, <S%H4672><s%> and shall find herself a place of rest. <S%H4494><s%>

The arrow snake <S%H7091><s%> will make her nest <S%H7077><s%> there, <S%H4422><s%> and lay, hatch, <S%H1234><s%> and gather <S%H1716><s%> under her shade. <S%H6738><s%> Yes, <S%H1772><s%> the kites will be gathered <S%H6908><s%> there, <S%H802><s%> every one with her mate. <S%H7468><s%>

Search in <S%H1875><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and read: <S%H7121><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H2007><s%> will be missing. <S%H5737><s%> none <S%H802><s%> will lack <S%H6485><s%> her mate. <S%H7468><s%> For my mouth <S%H6310><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and his Spirit <S%H7307><s%> has gathered them. <S%H6908><s%>

He has cast <S%H5307><s%> the lot <S%H1486><s%> for them, <S%H3027><s%> and his hand has divided <S%H2505><s%> it to them with a measuring line. <S%H6957><s%> They shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it forever. <S%H5769><s%> <S%H5704><s%> From generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%> they will dwell in it. <S%H7931><s%>
